# SynchronizedBlock.Lock method

Creates a new [`SynchronizedBlock`](../SynchronizedBlock.md) for synchronizing access to the specified object and enters the lock.

```csharp
public static SynchronizedBlock Lock(object syncObject)
```

## Return Value

The synchronized block.
